name: cashAdvance
description: A form used to get a cash advance, usually large sums of money.
rules: Cash advance cannot be obtained while an advance previously taken by applicant or any other person in the applicant's department is yet to be cleared
Cash advance can only be utilised for the purpose for which it was obtained.
Cash advance is to collected through e-payment to the bank from the cash office.
Unspent balance of the cash advance must be paid into the cash office and the official receipt obtained by the applicant.

name: imprest
description: A form used to get imprest, usually money in small amounts.
rules: The amount requested per imprest form must be less than 100K total and 10K per item.
